QuestData.Title: Go to Adana
QuestData.Description: We've struck a great blow against the quilboar here. I will stay here, and hold the line, but you need to move on.$B$BSeek Adana Thunderhorn; she has taken a few braves to the southwest to root out the rest of the Bristleback.
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to Adana Thunderhorn to the Southwest.
QuestData.RewardText: More trials lay ahead, $n. I hope you're prepared.
